title: Gezamenlijke "sent items" of "verzonden" voor pop accounts
content:
Ik weet niet of je ook ergens feature requests kunt doen.

De reden dat ik nog niet overgestapt ben op Thunderbird is bovenstaande. In outlook kan ik de map "verzonden items" nemen en daar snel even tussen recent verstuurde mails bladeren. En dat is handig want ik heb veel mail accounts waarvan een aantal ook pop3 is en dat is een bewuste keuze. Daarmee heb ik namelijk ook 1 gezamenlijke inbox, zodat ik o.a. de nieuwe mail veel sneller kan nakijken.

Een globale inbox maken kan ook met Thunderbird dus dat is geen probleem.

Maar ik zie geen mogelijkheid om ook een globale "verzonden items" te maken. Gaat zoiets nog komen?

Of is er een mogelijkheid om dan zelf een map verzonden items te maken en daarin alle verzonden berichten van alle pop accounts terecht te laten komen? Liefst op zo'n manier dat ik net als bij Outlook de globale inbox en verzonden box boven in het scherm heb staan boven de accounts. Net zoals de "favorieten" bij Outlook dus.
creator: Blacktiger63

title: Thunderbird email
content: I have multiple email accounts (multiple email addresses). If I setup multiple email addresses in Thunderbird will all emails from the various accounts show in my folders (inbox, sent, deteted, etc.)?

title: Latest installation freezing on both Desktop and Android phone
content: Thunderbird on my laptop (Win10pro on an I-7 HP laptop) keeps freezing (not crashing) and after installing on my Android (Moto G7+) the app freezes every single time I try to read the QR code on my desktop. Arrrggghhhh, can anyone help? I'm an experience computer user and Thunderbird user for over 20 years and all my other software works fine on both Desktop and Android.
creator: looppool

title: Gmail
content: I have 3 accounts with Gmail They are/ were all the same setup and everything was fine for years and now they are starting to not work properly. The sent mail folder doesn't work on one and it can't be deleted like the other 2. Delete and reinstall fixed it on one. And now the accounts functions are being merged. I deleted the sent mail on one and it deleted another one as well. The "fix" on the box for sent doesn't do anything. One account was getting mail in the inbox and sent mail box, the same message. And one account stopped sending mail but was receiving ok and I kept getting error messages that it was a bad address from Google. I've been playing with it for hours and finally got it sending and receiving to the right accounts I think. It's still set up per your directions for gmail. And I've rebooted TB and the computer a half a dozen times. Oh and TB also crashed once and sent the report. I hope you can figure this out because something is obviously corrupted. Thanks.
creator: tallen21

title: Missing emails
content:

Help, please!

title: Thunderbird Inbox display of messages
content: I know the mail server I use has many more years of email messages saved in the inbox than I can get to display when using thunderbird. The thunderbird inbox seems to limit to about the last 2 years of messages. How do I get to earlier messages? Many thanks for your help.

title: Messages from one account are marked "read" by default
content:
I have several accounts.

One of the accounts never shows that it has unread messages. If I go into it - I see new messages just fine, but they are marked as "read". If I go to that account through web - I see the new messages as "unread", as they should be.

This happens on only one of the accounts. All others correctly show, in the list of accounts, that I have unread messages. Do not see any difference between account settings.

The offending account is from gmail, but I also have another gmail one which works correctly.

Any suggestions where to look?

Thunderbird version is: 115.16.2 (64-bit)
creator: siberianowl

title: Security
content:
Occasionally some of my contacts said they were not receiving my emails. Therefore I sent an email to myself and it did not arrive. When I checked my sent box my email was there but the sent address consisted of the first part of my own address, followed by a completely different address, which I traced to a Spanish email provider: @d4.com.mx

It looks like my sent emails are sometimes being re-directed to someone else's address. How can this happen and more important how can it be stopped?
creator: jetind

title: I just set up Thunderbird to use with my Roadrunner email.  I can send messages but when I try to send I get message "connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) mail.twc.com timed out". .

title: Display oversized
content:
My display of Thunderbird is overrsized in width, probably not significantly but enough that I am missing text. Normally this is not a major concern but I was checking out a rule applied to incoming mail and could see features to the right. I am using W11 operating system on an HP Spectre.

I checked the Config Editor in settings and "layout.css.devPixelsPerPx" is not bold and is set at -1. How can reduced the width of the display?

Regards

Mike
creator: Mike791

title: Thunderbird suddenly won't download from one of my email accounts
content:
My Thunderbird on one of my computers has decided it won't download any emails for one of my email accounts, as of Nov. 1, 2024. I have several email accounts in Thunderbird, and only one email account doesn't download. It starts the process by logging in and saying it download 1 of x# of emails, and then it just stops downloading without giving me any error message.

I have the same Thunderbird email account on another computer and it works just fine. So it's obvious related to the one computer and one installation of Thunderbird.

Is there anything I can do to figure out how to fix this problem?
creator: jmaze1
